nodes.text: Planet Dreams, Incorporated, also called PlanetDreams, Inc. was a housing company that sold dwellings on many worlds. The corporation was known to hire many employees of diverse origin. A Lutrillian employee of Planet Dreams Inc. sold housing to residents of Cloud City until the Galactic Empire took over the settlement. By around 43 ABY, Cix Trouvee had become the vice president of the company, a title which he held until his death that year.
